}} The '''European Parliament election of 2004 in Slovenia''' was the election of [[Members of the European Parliament|MEP]] representing [[Slovenia (European Parliament constituency)|Slovenia constituency]] for the 2004-2009 term of the [[European Parliament]]. It was part of the wider [[European Parliament election, 2004|2004 European election]]. The vote took place on June 13. The biggest surprise was the victory of the [[New Slovenia|New Slovenia â€“ Christian People's Party]] over the [[Liberal Democracy of Slovenia]] and the defeat of the [[Slovene People's Party]], which did not win a seat. The parties on the right of centre that form the opposition in the Slovenian national parliament won this election. ==Results== {{European Parliament election, 2004 (Slovenia)}} {{European Union elections}} {{Slovenian elections}} {{DEFAULTSORT:European Parliament Election, 2004 (Slovenia)}} [[Category:European Parliament election, 2004|Slovenia]] [[Category:European Parliament elections in Slovenia]] [[Category:2004 in Slovenia]] [[Category:2004 elections in Europe]]
